content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the panevėžys district court the court made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the court awarded the applicant the threeroom apartment basement and movable items in the apartment and ordered the defendant to return their personal belongings the defendant was also ordered to pay the applicant a compensation amount of eur 276500 which would be deducted from the disposal of the matrimonial property additionally the defendant was ordered to pay a compensation amount of eur 110539 to fulfill the applicants credit obligation the court considered various articles of the civil code related to the division of property between spouses the costs of the proceedings were allocated between the parties based on the courts assessment of the claims in the end the defendant was ordered to pay a total of eur 379540 in costs
